vclaim: Hundreds of members of the National Guard were made to vacate the U.S. Capitol and sent to rest in a nearby parking garage, while providing security around U.S. President Joe Biden's inauguration.
title: Were National Guard Soldiers Forced To Sleep in a Parking Garage?
subtitle: Thousands of soldiers were in Washington, D.C., during Biden's inauguration to secure the area after a Jan. 6 riot at the Capitol.
author: Nur Ibrahim
